About.paragraph: Know44 is dedicated to providing the infrastructure for consumers, and retailers alike to put their money where their mouth is when it comes to combatting climate change. When retailers integrate our API into their retail management system, they will have the choice to automatically offset the carbon produced from the entire supply chain of their stock, or allow their customers the choice of supplementing their purchases by offsetting these emmisions themselves.
